inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect('effects/backstab'); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Backstab
description: When hiding or attacking a helpless or immobilized opponent, you gain a bonus to attack and a large bonus to damage with melee weapons.  These bonuses improve as you increase your Rogue level.  Note that creatures immune to Critical Hits are also immune to Backstab.
